	<ul>
		<li>Jay</li>
		<li>Ganatra</li>
		...
	</ul>
</div>


<script src="../vendors/custom_vertical_ticker/vticker.js"></script>
<script>

$(".vticker").vTicker({
    speed: 500,
    pause: 2500,
    showItems: 4,
    animation: "fade",
    mousePause: true,
    height: 0,
    direction: "up",
});

</script>
